commands.description: Logs the player in as an ADMIN user, giving them access to tools designed to help with game development and debugging.
Outputs a text-based description of each room in the current game.
Outputs a text-based description of the current room in the current game.
Lists the available ADMIN commands that are available.
Lists the macros that have been created for the current game.
Begins the recording of a macro for the current game, use this command followed by a one-word name for the macro. (Note: You can run existing macros as part of the currently recording macro!)
Stops the currently recording macro and saves it as a file.
Displays the commands that are stored within the specified macro (One-word name).

Runs the specified macro (To see the available macros use _macrols). WARNING! Running macros may take time, since it goes through each stored command, calling it as though a player entered the command.

Runs the specified macro (To see the available macros use _macrols). WARNING! Running macros may take time, since it goes through each stored command, calling it as though a player entered the command.
Searches through any 'devnotes' that have been defined in the game's source files. A entering a space will return all devnotes.
